p: A statistically significant and negative association was obtained between the spread of DF incidence rates and longitudes (β = -5.08, P < 0.01) and latitudes of the streets (β = -1.99, P < 0.01) ( Table 3). The results indicated that DF incidence rates increased with the areas geographically variation which may provide with the information of target streets for DF prevention and control in the future.
